review: This game...This ♥♥♥♥ing game. Sure its a good game and all but, I cant play with any friends i cant even see what a IP Is. And worst of all alot of times i get stuck not being able to equip anything and just walk around cars waiting or them to explode, Its the only way to kill zombies for me SINCE I CANT EQUIP ♥♥♥♥! Even with the 'Equip button in the menu and the 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 And 0 Keys, I give this 3/10 Shitloops
